resources.string: This application will collect data on you throughout the day then once the day is over it will summarise this data. You can then view this data in the calendar above. To turn on tracking please go into the settings menu and select the data sources you would like to keep track of. These can be turned off at any time and the app will only summarise data from data sources which are switched on. Your data is not being sent outside of your own phone and the data is kept in an secure database on your phone only.
